QuestInfo.fullDiz: Become the Colosseum’s joint owner.
I should deliver this package to Sergo, my father's friend.
Show everyone a real fight at the Colosseum.
Archeologists dig for something interesting... They have almost no defense. It is a perfect opportunity to earn some money.
The town %1n asks you to accompany the caravan up to %2n
An inhabitant of %1n asked me defend the transport on his way to %2n and offered to pay %3d.
%1n demands me to accompany the transport carrying an important cargo to %2n. If It will arrive safely, I will get %3d.
The transport from %1n goes to %2n. Some bandits often ambush traders coming that way, so I agreed to protect them for a mere %3d.
The town %1n asks you to destroy the enemy for a reward.
The citizens of %1n are often being attacked by the cunning brigand who always escapes punishment. I agreed to get rid of him for %3d.
I will get %3d, when I get rid of a villain that threatens %1n.
The town %1n will pay %3d coins for each enemy killed.
The local bandit must be cut down to size! The people of %1n will pay %3d for every killed enemy.
The authorities of %1n began to fight for the safety of the trade routes I will be paid %3d for every villain slain.
You must pay %3d percents of your money for %2b to redeem your evil deeds.
The town %1n asks you to deliver package to %2n
I’ll get %3d, when I deliver the package to %2n. Somebody is waiting for it, but I am not going to hurry for such a small amount on money.
Some crank from %1n will pay me %3d, if I go and say hello to his friend living in %2n.
Inform Aeterna’s people of the Colosseum
Now I know for sure that Ben is the man I need. The question is where to find him.
My life is in ruins. To make it whole again I have to learn more about my real father. My only hope is Ben Throttle, whoever he is...
Probably, Homer may be found at the bar of one of the local settlements
Probably, Homer may be found at the bar of one of the local settlements
The warehouse is occupied by the extremists. I must free their leader in order to get what I need.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find out in Olme where the leader is kept.
Bring the leader to his people.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Local raiders hinder archeologists from digging. I have to get rid of them.
One way to get what I need is to destroy all that oppose me.
Some businessman wants to reopen the Colosseum. I can help.
Inform Midgard’s people of the Colosseum.
Inform Porto’s people of the Colosseum.
Return to Colosseum to get your reward.
Return to Colosseum to get your reward.
Find and examine the signs.
There are mysterious signs on the Yarr' fields.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell the scientists about the signs
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Tell the scientists of Midgard will find out what is happening here.
I made the first bargain in my life. Father will be happy to learn about it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the warehouse from the bandits
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The warehouse id occupied by the bandits. I must find the way to drive them away.
Yarr' farmers are scared and refuse to harvest.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring Rich farmer to the filling station.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Rich Farmer will reward me when I bring him to the filling station.
Someone at the Asgard’s bar must know the way to cross the mountains.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Go to the bar and name the password.
Buy some explosives at the Asgard.
Buy some explosives at the miners’ village.
Repulse the attack of the bandits

QuestInfo.fullDiz: This cargo must be delivered at all cost. My mission is to accompany it and make sure nothing happens to it.
I have the explosives. All I need is to place it at the right place.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Free the oil mine from the bandits.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: First I have to find a way to the Axels land. Then I’ll decide what to do with him!
I got to follow this one to the base. I must not attack this car.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ben was last seen in Midgard
Find the entrance to the tunnel.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now that I know, where the entrance is, there should be no problem in crossing it.
Soon I'll meet Ben Throttle and learn the truth of my origin.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Buy the key from the barman.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I am sure the barman knows that the gate is locked. He may even have the key to it.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask about Alice at the Area 51.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: So Alice is connected with the bandits. Not that I am surprised, but still...
Soon Alice will pay for all she has done! I know exactly where she is!
Felix seems to be innocent of killing my father. My only trace is Alice. She is the witness of the crime.
The trace, left by my father leads to the distant land, where the all-knowing Oracle lives.
My father may still be alive! I will find him no matter what.|Some traces may be found at his house in Minin.
The Crimson Dawn is enlisting new recruits. To become of them is a sure way get closer to Axel.
The Commonwealth of the Independent Towns needs help to fight with Axels’ forces. If I join them, we will crush the tyrant!
Somewhere in the far north the Sea Gate are located. The caravan from Minin will show me the way to that region.
The oil mine workers are sitting in the Minin’s bar. I must convince them to return back to work.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Find a place for the ambush.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Sooner or later, someone will use the tunnel. I will ambush him and get the key!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Follow the caravan to its destination.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: CD keeps receiving resources and manpower via the tunnel. Once captured, it will grant CIT the firm connection with the outside world. And at the same time it will cut the enemy supplies flow. The tunnel’s guardians must die for the sake of high ideals.
My actions did not go unnoticed. Soon I will meet with the high leaders of the CIT!
The moment of truth is near. Soon I will meet Axel face to face!
I have to eliminate the threat of bandits’ attacks to go through Pest. The only way I can think of is to blow up the bridge leading to their base.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Set the oil mine free from the bandits
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I will need to restore the work of the oil mine, so that the people of Minin show me the way north.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Enlist the support of a major faction.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It sounds like trouble. Alice is a girl of some local crime leader. It will be too hard to get her without support. It’s high time to find some powerful allies.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Enlist the support of a major faction.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It looks I won’t be able to get Axel all by myself. It’s high time to find some powerful allies.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Collect enough money to pay the fee
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The bandits agree to let me pass trough their land for 10000 coins.
Looks the only language the bandits understand is the sound of the gunshots!
The village is under attack! My vehicle is the closest to the battle location. I must help.
I smell rat. I must make the miners work! And someone here lies to me!
A pretty girl asked to accompany her. She has a look of a criminal on her, but who cares.
I must meet the rebels of Toskana and learn all they have to tell. With any luck, they have information that will help us to defeat Axel.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver the canister of oil to Minin.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: This canister is a symbol of the fact that that the oil mines is working again. I must deliver it to the town.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring hired workers to the oil mine.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: As soon as I bring these guys to the oil mine, they will begin to work.
I must find the entrance to the undersea tunnel that leads to the Oracle's land.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver the rebels’ leader to Helvetia.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I hope the information he has really worth all the sacrifices.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask road to Minin in Pest

QuestInfo.fullDiz: That is the last piece of the puzzle. We will make the General tell us about Axel’s weak point.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver workers to the oil mine.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Now the workers are masters of their own fate. And they gladly agreed to go working on the oil mine. I wonder why?
I have the key to the tunnel’s gate. I only have to open it.
My mission is to patrol the border in case the enemy appears.
Guess I should try to find workers somewhere else.
The locals made up their minds to scare the raiders away. Maybe I should help them.
It’s time to return to Touse.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Try to cross the chasm somewhere else.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I have to cross that chasm. There are two bridges. One is the town Pest, another one is at the bandits’ territory.
If I follow that car to its destination, I will probably find an occasion to steal the key.
Wherever the murderer is hiding, I’ll find and punish hum!
Accompanied by several elite CIT’s warriors, I must capture Crimson Dawn’s general.
Someone in Minin can know about the Sea Gate.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Ask in Asgard about the tunnel.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Someone there must know how and where one may cross mountains.
She asked for it!
His name is Philemon. Please bring him back! I love him so much.
The druid mentioned strange signs. Let’s take a closer look.
The hermit druid is living alone far from friends. I should pay him a visit to say hello.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring some medicine and some wood to the botanist
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I can buy some wood in the town, but I wonder, where may I find any medicine?
Old soldier told something about the botanist. Probably I have to find him.
The hospital is the right place to look for medicine.
I must find the strange man at the Midgard.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Give materials and 15'000 coins to the master.
Talk to Ben about the aliens.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Ben knows a lot of stories about Ivan’s adventures. Hopefully one of these stories will show me the way.
The old man asked to bring him to the ancient ruins. I think he is going to die there. Creepy.
A strange couple asked to bring them home. They offer a lot of money for such a simple task.
According to the boy’s advertisements, the Entertainment Center is just a paradise. Let’s check it out.
The Oracle is completely mad. He plans to destroy everything, starting with me. I cannot allow this to happen!
Power station at the Seil is a source of powerful noise. It jams the Oracle’s signals and he cannot get control over the orbital weapon.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take the disk away from the thief.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: That thief doesn’t know who he up against is yet. The disk will be mine.
I must find the way north. People of Minin know how to get there.
Everything is upside down at my father’s house. Somebody must have seen what had happened. I’ll ask in the Bar.
Alice has stolen the disks and left to the west. I must catch her at all costs!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver second disk to the Oracle.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Using it the Oracle will decipher Ivan Go’s diary.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Catch the runner at the abandoned town.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The bandit is hiding somewhere at the abandoned town. The villagers will pay me if I kill him.
Only the Oracle may possess the weapon powerful enough to destroy the source of the contamination.
The thief have nowhere to go, but to the Area 51. I’ll get him there!
She left somewhere at the direction of Asgard.
The way to the Sea Gate lays through the swamp. I must find the way to cross it.
Most certainly he has the second disk!
Someone stole a masterpiece from Aesthete. The only man who appreciates that kind of goods is Virtuoso.
Someone by the name of Trickster is the organizer of this theft. I am to catch him and return the masterpiece to its owner.
To get a reward, I must return the masterpiece to Aesthete. However, there may be someone else to offer a higher price.
I am the only one who can stop the madness, happening with the world. I will install the device that will lower the level of contamination. This is my destiny.

The alien ship was hiding here all the time. They killed many humans in quest for new territories. I must stop them! Hopefully, the destruction of this machine will allow the Oracle to take control over the orbital weapon.
The Boss may cause me a lot of trouble, after I had stolen his cargo. I must strike first.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return to Trickster with the cargo.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The aliens must know how to stop that horrible device. They are my last resort.
The trace leads to Seil. Somewhere around here the alien vessel was seen.
I learned that the caravan with the precious cargo will soon go south almost unguarded. It is a good chance.
I must personate the rebel and misinform the CIT’s agent.
I have to return to Marezzia for a new assignment.
Now I must attack the caravan with CIT supplies. It will definitely lower the enemy morale.
That old fox is about to break my cover! I cannot allow this.
Now that I know, where Alice is, I won’t let her go!
The time has come for me to fight with Axel on the arena. Man, I’ve been waiting for this moment for so long.
So, I was not the only one to be cheated by Alice. Axel is also looking for her. He pointed out her last location to me, somewhere near Seil. I wonder why she went there, she may easily be caught.
I need to deliver some wine from the monastery. But I think there’s mire in this assignment than that.
If I destroy several CIT’s vehicles at random, it will make the enemy nervous.
Now it’s time for more serious matters. Attacking the village is a sure way to enrage the enemy.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Deliver the second disk to the Oracle.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Finally, with the second disk at my disposal, I can go to Ignott and speak with the Oracle.
The prioress has a mission for me. I must hunt down and kill the heretic and the pagan.
Now I must save the rebel’s leader.
I lured the CIT’s leaders into the trap. Now I must kill them all to end this war. And to get a reward from the hands of Axel.
It finally happened! I am a war hero now and soon I will meet Axel!
Delivering the cargo is an easy job. Not very exciting yet rewarding enough.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Return the junk back to Marezzia.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: It is starting to get interesting. I wonder how many times I am supposed to drag that old machinery back and forth.
Surely, a new assignment is waiting for me at the Marezzia.
Surely, a new assignment is waiting for me at the Marezzia. I wonder if I am getting any closer to Axel.
I am ordered to kill all the rebels. I doubt if I must... it is a really evil deed...
I heard the Cloister nuns know more than they say. And if they are really hiding Alice, she won’t escape this time!

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Tell in Midgard about the signs
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The scientists of Midgard will surely get interested in the mysterious traces that appeared on the field. With any luck I will be rewarded for telling them.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Take a look at the field.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: I think it’s worth looking at the field. I wonder what scared people so much.
To earn the trust of the druids, I must cleanse their sanctuary from monsters. Weird, I always thought that the monsters don’t exist.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Get in touch with peaceful indigenes.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: The first people I met there were not friendly at all. I should look for someone more peaceful.
Someone here must know the Oracle whereabouts. The only question is where to find him or her.
Someone here must know the Oracle whereabouts. The only question is where to find him or her.
I know the way to the Oracle now. Soon I’ll meet him.
No news was heard from Uluk for some time now. I am to investigate, what had happened there.
The Children of Iron plan to overthrow the druids. So they need to get rid of their leader. I agreed to lure the High druid out of the Town in exchange for the Oracle whereabouts information.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Bring the Druid to the ambush.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: Not all the people of Uluk submitted to the faith of the Children of Iron. I have to help druids to escape.
I was told that the High Druid, residing at Seth knows the Oracle whereabouts.
If the fanatics do not understand in a good way, then I have to talk to them with my guns.
Now that I have the two disks, I may finally learn the fate of my father. I hope the contents of the diary will lead me to him.
The Oracle Disciples will let me pass if the monster, living by the ruins, will be killed. As a proof, I must bring them its head.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Give monster head to the defenders

QuestInfo.fullDiz: The Oracle may help me, but first I must help him to regain memory. Then he will know how to read the disk I have.
Some strange fellows are guarding the way to the Oracle. I must pass them by somehow.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Upgrade the truck to cross the desert.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: My truck needs to be improved if want to cross the desert. I have the blueprints, now I need someone to do the job.
Now that I have the two disks, I can finally decipher Ivan Go’s diary. I hope its contents will help me to find out who has destroyed my village and how to find them!
The second disk may be hidden at my father’s house. Probably, I haven’t noticed it first time.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Talk to Ben about the disk.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: Ben Throttle, the famous Explorer may know where to find the second disk.
The Oracle claims that Alice knows more than she says. Anyway I must return to her and ask about the second disk.
The Oracle will only talk to me if I bring him any two artifacts from the Town of the Dead.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Go to the Town of the Dead.

QuestInfo.fullDiz: I only know the approximate location of the lair. But I will find it anyway.

QuestInfo.briefDiz: Get in touch with the locals.
QuestInfo.fullDiz: First of all I must find someone to show me the way. I only hope people do live here...
Really strange people live here. I must find someone saner to have my questions answered.
Ivan went this way. I only know the direction. But I will find him, of what has left of him...
People of Kef are short of oil. Without it, the machines won’t work and the vehicles will not be able to patrol and protect citizens.
I hope, when I help these people, they will tell me where I can find what I need. Moreover, I cannot let them die just like that!
The alien ship is the source of contamination that almost wiped out the life on our planet. It must be destroyed for the sake of survivors.
The path is blocked by the military base full of aggressive people. Battle is the only way to go.
The Scientist mentioned alien spacecraft. I have to go and see it with my own eyes!
The alien ship is the source of contamination that almost wiped out the life on our planet. It must be stopped for the sake of the survivors. There must be a peaceful solution of this matter.
These people saved my life. I think their leader wants something from me in return.
